Text: Uh oh, it looks like hard drive buying season is here again.

Would you say this was better quality than your The Sopranos Season 2 Complete 720p torrent from April?  I fancy updating all my series to 720p, but don't know which to choose...  Thanks for the great work, by the way!
it has better quality than simple s02 720p.

X264 1080p is the best quality, then in 2nd place is X264 720p and then XVID...i dont understand why encoders all over the world are encoding/converting 1080p sources to 720p when they could easily just leave the resolution alone. nobody cares about having more reference frames 1080p is superior to 720p but theres nothing i can do about it..so im stuck with X264 1080p movies and X264 720p and XVID tv seasons/episodes...wish it would be 1080
